entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
